hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find quick answers about our AI and digital transformation services

general.a: We are an innovation and technology agency specialized in AI, automation, software development and digital consulting. We transform ideas into digital futures with disruptive methodology.

general.q: In which countries do you operate?
general.a: We operate globally. We work with clients in Spain, Latin America, United States and Europe. All our services are 100% remote.

general.q: How long does it take to implement a project?
general.a: It depends on the service. A WhatsApp chatbot can be ready in 2-3 weeks. Software development projects take 2-6 months. Comprehensive consulting can be 3-12 months.

services.a: We offer 5 main services: WhatsApp Automation with AI, Business Automation, AI Software Development, Comprehensive Consulting, and AI Sales Funnel.

services.q: Can I hire just one service or do I need a complete package?
services.a: You can hire individual services according to your needs. There are no mandatory packages. We recommend starting with a pilot service and scaling based on results.

services.q: Do you offer support after implementation?
services.a: Yes, all our projects include 30 days of post-launch support. After that we offer monthly maintenance plans with guaranteed SLA.
It's our free tool that validates business ideas using AI. It analyzes viability, market, competition and gives you a detailed report in minutes.

pricing.q: How much do your services cost?
pricing.a: Prices vary according to complexity, required technology and project scope. Each solution is customized to maximize ROI. Schedule a call to receive a detailed quote tailored to your specific needs.
Yes, we offer payments in phases: 40% at start, 30% mid-project, 30% at completion. For large projects we accept monthly payments.
No. All quotes are transparent and include development, implementation and initial support. Additional costs only for approved scope changes.

technical.a: We use Next.js, React, Node.js, Python, Supabase, PostgreSQL, OpenAI GPT-4, Claude, n8n, Make, and more. We choose the best technology for each project.
Yes, all our developments are designed to scale. We use cloud-native architectures, microservices and distributed databases.

technical.q: Do you integrate with existing systems?
technical.a: Yes, we integrate with CRMs (Salesforce, HubSpot), ERPs (SAP, Odoo), WhatsApp Business API, social networks, and any system with API.

technical.q: What AI models do you use?
technical.a: We work with the most advanced models: Claude Opus 4.5, GPT-5.2, Gemini 3 Pro/Flash, GLM-4.7, and open-source models like Llama 3.3, Qwen 3, DeepSeek V3. We choose based on use case, budget and privacy requirements.

process.a: 1) Discovery call (free), 2) Proposal and quote, 3) Kick-off and planning, 4) Iterative development with weekly demos, 5) Testing and adjustments, 6) Launch and training.

process.q: Can I see the project progress?
process.a: Yes, we use agile methodology with weekly demos. You'll have access to real-time Kanban board and progress reports every Friday.
We offer satisfaction guarantee. If within the first 14 days you're not happy, we refund 100% of the initial payment no questions asked.
